title: MY ACCOUNT WAS BANNED?!
body: So i logged on yesterday and it wasnt banned, i logged in today and it said it was permanently banned?! I didnt play any games and i didnt even get an email saying why i got perma banned...

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up and it looks like there was some unusual activity going on. I don't want to give out too much personal information here on the boards, but if you hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we'll be able to go over everything with you there!

I got permanently suspended but i didn't verbally abuse anyone or harrass them. Please review my case and unban my account, I have been stressed out because of this and a bit depressed. I love Riot and League of Legends. Please help me.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
